notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, Y.D., A.O.M.-T., and S.L.-V.; methodology, Y.D., M.C.-G., E.Q., and J.C.; software, Y.D., S.L.-V., N.V., and R.C.; validation, N.V., R.C., and S.L.-V.; formal analysis, Y.D., S.L.-V., J.-P.C., N.V., and R.C.; investigation, Y.D., J.C., E.Q., B.M., and M.C.-G.; resources, Y.D., L.C., L.M., I.B.M., B.A., J.-P.C., L.M., and S.L.-V.; data curation, Y.D., S.L.-V., and B.A.; writing—original draft preparation, Y.D. and S.L.-V.; writing—review and editing, N.V., R.C., J.-P.C., and B.A.; supervision, N.V. and S.L.-V.; project administration, Y.D. and S.L.-V.; funding acquisition, Y.D., J.-P.C., N.V., and S.L.-V.
